瓪瓪瓪

瓪字的基本解释

瓪
bǎn
破瓦。
〔瓪瓦〕同“板瓦”，弯曲程度较小的瓦。
牝瓦，即仰盖的瓦，与牡瓦相对。

瓪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǎn］
［《廣韻》布綰切，上潸，幫。］
［《廣韻》博管切，上緩，幫。］
(1)破瓦。
(2)仰盖的瓦。

瓪字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　瓪； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页748第09
【唐韻】布綰切【集韻】補綰切，?音版。【說文】敗也。　又【集韻】一曰牝瓦。　又【廣韻】博管切【集韻】補滿切，?音粄。又【集韻】甫遠切，音反。義?同。

瓪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瓪字的起名意思

暂无。

Huf
Basic explanation of words
Huf
bǎn
Broken tiles.
[Wafer tile] Same as "plate tile", a tile with a smaller degree of curvature.
Min tile, the roof tile, is opposite to the mu tile.
Huf
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǎn］
["Guangyun" cloth string cut, Shanglu, help. ]
["Guangyun" Bo pipe cutting, slow up, help. ]
(1) Broken tiles.
(2) Roof tiles.
Huf
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Wa Zi Department] 　瓪; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: Page 748 09
[Tang Yun] Cloth and Cut [Ji Yun] Supplement and Cut, Sound Version. [Said the text] also defeated.　[Jiyun] One more time, it is called Suwa.　[Guangyun] Boguan cut [Jiyun] fills up the cut,? Yin 粄. Also [Jiyun] cut far away, the sound is reversed. Righteous? Same.

Name meaning
Nothing.
bǎn
1、 破瓦。2、〔～瓦〕同“板瓦”，弯曲程度较小的瓦。3、牝瓦，即仰盖的瓦，与牡瓦相对。
